price: da bi bili nezahvalni na onom što im Mi dajemo. Pa uživajte, a saznat ćete!
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
